price: They say, “There is nothing beyond our life in this world, and we will not be resurrected.”
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
